Welcome to the Help Centre!

[App name] is designed to generate the co-operative achievement ranks of game categories you've saved, as well as track the history and results of your played games.

Game Category:
Displays the different game categories you've entered into the system. Click the + to add a new game category.

Add Game Configuration:
Fill in the 'Game Name', 'Good Score', and 'Bad Score' and click save to generate a new game category.

Games:
Displays the game history of one game category and the results of each game. Click on the + to add a new game. Click on an individual played game to edit/delete the game.

Add Game:
Fill in the '# of players' and 'Sum of scores' and click save to generate a new game.

Achievements:
Displays the different possible achievements of one game category based on the number of players you've entered.
